sentences.en: He was indubitably not happy at bottom , restless and disquieted.
sentences.cn: 很显然,他内心是不高兴的, 深感忧虑不安.

sentences.en: He was, indubitably, the most suitable candidate.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是最合适的人选。
他的行为明显是欠思量。

sentences.en: Indubitably, in order to achieve this goal we have to continue practise Object - Oriented design .
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 为了达到这个目标我必须继续实践 面向对象.
不消说的, 一定发生了什么重大的事情.
毫无疑问萨克斯先生很有魅力。

sentences.en: That is indubitably the best course of action.
You are doubtless quite right to adhere to him, indubitably, he adhered to you.
sentences.cn: 你和她合得很不坏, 不消说, 他也和你合得来.

words.tran_cn: 无疑地，不容置疑地，不容置疑地
